retrieveSpfRecord

protected java.lang.String retrieveSpfRecord(java.lang.String hostname)
                                      throws PermErrorException,
                                             TempErrorException
Get the SPF-Record for a server

Parameters:
dns - The dns service to query
hostname - The hostname for which we want to retrieve the SPF-Record
spfVersion - The SPF-Version which should used.
Returns:
The SPF-Record if one is found.
Throws:
PermErrorException - if more then one SPF-Record was found.
TempErrorException - if the lookup result was "TRY_AGAIN"

Return the extracted SPF-Record

Parameters:
spfR - the List which holds TXT/SPF - Records
Returns:
returnValue the extracted SPF-Record
Throws:
PermErrorException - if more then one SPF - Record was found in the given List.
